metadata.title: CVE-2024-26919 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: ulpi: Fix debugfs directory leakThe ULPI per-device debugfs root is named after the ulpi device'sparent, but ulpi_unregister_interface tries to remove a debugfsdirectory named after the ulpi device itself. This results in thedirectory sticking around and preventing subsequent (deferred) probesfrom succeeding. Change the directory name to match the ulpi device.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
